sqlMap.select: SELECT role_id AS userRoleId, user_id AS userId, username AS userName, password AS password, employee_name AS employeeName, users.employee_id AS userEmployeeId FROM ms_user users JOIN ms_employee emp ON users.employee_id = emp.employee_id WHERE lower(username) = lower(#username#) AND password = #password# AND is_login = '0' AND status = '1'
SELECT 1 FROM ms_user users JOIN ms_employee emp ON users.employee_id = emp.employee_id WHERE lower(username) = lower(#username#) AND password = #password# AND status = '1'
SELECT 1 FROM ms_user users JOIN ms_employee emp ON users.employee_id = emp.employee_id WHERE username = #username# AND password = #password# AND is_login = '1' AND status = '1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ms_user SET is_login = #status# WHERE username = #username#
UPDATE ms_user SET is_login = '0', update_date = SYSDATE WHERE is_login = '1'
sqlMap.select: SELECT username AS userName, employee_name AS employeeName, email AS email, TO_CHAR(date_of_birth, 'YYYYMMDD') AS birthday FROM ms_user users JOIN ms_employee emp ON users.employee_id = emp.employee_id WHERE LOWER(username) = LOWER(#username#)
